name: rig simulator.
description:
you are entering a world full of wonders and new challenges that will keep you on your toes for hours on end. you can feel the sensation of hitting a wall rushing through you

rig simulator. is a game where your wildest dreams can become reality!

Provided your dream is related to running into different kinds of non-interactive walls.

Have you ever wanted to accidentally run into walls instead of go down hallways? Now you can do that minus the hallways! Live out a whole wall of fantasies!

(More walls coming at a later date. Now playable in your browser!)

(should probably work on mobile)

How the heck do I video games??

[Z = A Button] CONFIRM

[X = B Button] CHOOSE SECOND DIALOGUE OPTION

[Arrow Keys = D-Pad] MOVEMENT
